routes.name: Energy Route (Middle East - Japan)
routes.insight: Survival rate for Energy Route (Middle East - Japan) dropped to 68.9%. Critical bottleneck at Strait of Hormuz with 31.1% disruption risk due to intense conflicts within 1500km. Alternative routing (e.g., avoiding Strait of Hormuz) is highly recommended.

routes.name: Energy Route (Middle East - Europe)
routes.insight: Survival rate for Energy Route (Middle East - Europe) dropped to 55.9%. Critical bottleneck at Suez Canal with 44.1% disruption risk due to intense conflicts within 1500km. Alternative routing (e.g., avoiding Suez Canal) is highly recommended.
